items.title: Trump acknowledges Constitution prohibits his election to a third term
items.description: Trump, 79, has for months openly mused about serving beyond January 2029, when he is scheduled to leave office.

items.title: Maryland’s Democratic Senate president blocks anti-Trump redistricting fight

items.title: Appeals court will reconsider whether Trump can send troops to Portland
items.description: A three-judge appeals court panel had ruled in Trump’s favor on deploying National Guard forces. Now a larger panel will reconsider the case.
